items.title: These are JPMorgan's favorite stocks heading into June
items.description: These are the stocks the firm has on its radar as a new month of trading begins, including a video game giant that JPMorgan also labeled a top pick.

items.title: While gold hogs the headlines, these other metals have promising technical set-ups, says Katie Stockton
items.description: The chart analyst looks at copper and platinum.

items.title: Stocks just had a big earnings season rally. History shows June could be a rough one
items.description: The VIX volatility index has, on average, surged 19% in the month following a blowout earnings season and subsequent rally.

items.title: Best Stocks: This momentum play seeing huge investor accumulation is on the verge of another breakout
items.description: Josh and Sean discuss a credit card stock leading the momentum rally.

items.title: Sports betting stocks slide after Illinois lawmakers approve tax hike
items.description: Shares of online sports betting platforms struggled in Monday's session.
